downloadTitle: Hotfix for VMM 2016 - Test replica failover issue
downloadDescription: Hotfix for VMM 2016 - Test replica failover issue
detailsSection:
Summary

This article describes the bug fixes that are included in this hotfix -
Important:This hotfix is only applicable for deployments that have Update Rollup 2.1 for System Center 2016 Virtual Machine Manager.

Issues that are fixed in this hotfix-
  • When the test VM is deleted from ASR or VMM after successful verification of test failover for Hyper-V replication, its causing the deletion of other replicated data/files (which are not related to the VM under test). In case of ASR, this results in critical state indication for the other replicated VMs.
systemRequirementsSection: This hotfix is only applicable for deployments that have Update Rollup 2.1 for System Center 2016 Virtual Machine Manager.
installInstructionSection:
To install the update packages, run the following command from an elevated command prompt:

msiexec.exe /update packagename

For example, to install this hotfix package for a System Center 2016 Virtual Machine Manager - Server (KB4014442), run the following command:

msiexec.exe /update kb4014442_vmmserver_amd64.msp

Notes
  • Performing an update to on the VMM server requires installing the VMM Server updates. For more information, see the following topic on TechNet:  How to install, remove, or verify update rollups for System Center 2012 VMM
